message: CSS shapes has been in active development for so long and landed in Chrome/Android Chrome long before iOS Safari ... When it finally became supported in the new iOS Safari everyone lose their shit ...
story: Ahmad Alfy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: CSS shapes in email » STYLECampaign »

description: CSS shapes allow us to move away from boxy designs, towards organic magazine style layouts. In the photo below the text follows the contours of the image, as well as being shaped into a ball. Thanks to iOS 8, we can explore similar creative layouts in email by wrapping content around polygons, stand…

data.message: Well, iOS accounts for about 70+% of mobile traffic...
A research center, but I can't remember the name :/

This changed recently 
http://www.businessinsider.com/android-is-beating-ios-in-web-usage-2014-8
I do not trust these numbers ... but the number of the Android-powered devices exceeds the iPhone/Pad/Pod ... So it is statistically impossible for the percentage to be 70%+

It's because not everyone who buys an android uses it as a smart phone. 
Android is half-smart phone
